Feature Evaluation

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Aliquam dignissim accumsan tempor. Nam pellentesque justo quam, quis malesuada libero semper ut. Duis laoreet augue elit, eleifend posuere sapien varius eu.

Suspendisse tristique orci eget sem accumsan, ut cursus turpis porta. Donec elementum tellus vitae diam facilisis, in eleifend mi maximus. Fusce erat tortor, pharetra ac cursus at, volutpat eu sem. Ut et semper velit, ac feugiat nulla. Sed ipsum leo, rutrum a justo et, aliquam iaculis elit. Proin scelerisque vitae massa nec elementum.

When participants were asked whether or not each feature was easy to understand they responded in the following ways:


Spending Forecast

52% of participants reported Spending Forecast was easy to understand.


Appliance Diagnosis

60% of participants reported Appliance Diagnosis was easy to understand.

Energy Spending Goal

68% of participants reported Goal Setting was easy to understand.


Program Match

85% of participants reported Program Match was easy to understand.
